QuestData.Title: The Vindicaar
QuestData.Description:
Everything is prepared for our assault. We need only establish the beacon to transport us to the vessel.
Once the beacon arrives, place your hand upon its surface to board the Vindicaar, the instrument of our retribution.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Prophet Velen on the Vindicaar.
QuestData.RewardText: I have waited many years for this day.$B$BBehold the triumph of the draenei, the Vindicaar!
